HomePage.title: English App - application for learning English
HomePage.subtitle: Take your English skills to the next level with our simple, engaging lessons. Whether you are a beginner or looking to improve, practice at your own pace with tools designed for real-life conversations.

Hangman.title: Hangman
Hangman.description: Game, in which you need to guess the word in as few attempts as possible
